Question & Options:
What roles do Suhaan, Agastya, and Piya play in the plot of 'Jaan-E-Mann'?
Options:
A. A) Suhaan is trying to avoid paying alimony to Piya.
B. B) Agastya is being helped by Suhaan to win over Piya.
C. C) Piya's brother, Vishal, is involved in the divorce process.
D. D) All of the above

What are the relationships among Suhaan, Agastya, Piya, and Vishal in *Jaan-E-Mann*?
Options:
A. A) Suhaan and Piya were previously married.
B. B) Agastya is trying to win over Piya.
C. C) Vishal played a role in the divorce process between Suhaan and Piya.
D. D) Piya is Agastya's first love.
Correct Answer: A) Suhaan and Piya were previously married., B) Agastya is trying to win over Piya., C) Vishal played a role in the divorce process between Suhaan and Piya.
